[B]About us:[/B]
[B]Clairty[/B] is a new [B]economy[/B] server with a [B]dedicated[/B] development team pushing new updates [B]daily[/B]. We are committed to making this server [B]succeed[/B], join us today!
[B]Features:[/B]
All skills trainable 20+ Bosses Gambling Jadinkos Godwars Creative Home area Auras Completionist Cape Requirements Shooting Stars Artisan's Workshop Farming Polypore Dungeon Well designed economy Full prayer system Custom Client Loader Customs quests 100% uptime No lag Dedicated staff Daily updates Dedicated server hosted
